Player Command
==============

See: :doc:`skills <skills>` :doc:`hp <hp>` :doc:`stats <stats>` :doc:`score <score>` 

USAGE

 |  ``materials``
 |  ``materials all`` - show all materials on the MUD

Shows your materials and all the materials in it.
